articles.content:

articles.title: Morning Report | Chael Sonnen intrigued by Conor McGregor Irish presidency run: ‘I actually would vote for him’
articles.description: Chael Sonnen has no idea if Conor McGregor actually has a future in politics, but he supports the UFC star’s gusto.
articles.content:
Chael Sonnen can’t help but wonder what a Conor McGregor political career would look like.

articles.title: A blast from the past as Channel 12 celebrates its 70th birthday
articles.description: “Working on this project reinforced to me how the history of any news organization is also the history of its community,” Ted Nesi, the station’s politics and business editor, said.
articles.content:
I asked Ted Nesi to tell us more about the project and what to expect this week.
The station is celebrating in grand fashion this week with a series of stories looking back at its history over the last seven decades. I think they should recreate an o... [4334 chars]

articles.title: Former San Francisco Mayor Willie Brown Opens His Closet for Charity
articles.description: Mr. Brown, the former mayor of San Francisco, has stood out not just for his politics but also his style. Now, he has opened his closet to raise money for charity.
articles.content:
In January 1996, the newly sworn-in mayor of San Francisco noticed something wrong at City Hall. One of his aides was wearing a linen suit in the winter. The mayor, shocked, sent him home to change immediately.
